title: Peace and quiet [Widescreen]
creator_credit: Dave Redman, Daniel Armstrong and Strong Man Pictures
brief_description: When the formula to create a super secret agent is stolen from Dr. Genius, it’s left up to special agents Julian Pearce and Frank Quiet to get it back. (Awards: Winner of the Best Special Effects, St Kilda film Festival, 2000, Best Editing in an Australian Film) Cast includes Charles Hollywood and Brian Sisko. Written by Daniel Armstrong.
